meanings.definition: Break down or decompose (a substance) by the action of its own enzymes.
meanings.sent1: The fruit autolyzed quickly, turning into mush.
meanings.sent2: The bacteria autolyzed the organic matter in the compost pile.
meanings.sent3: The bread autolyzed so fast, it seemed like magic!
meanings.sent4: Time autolyzed the memories, fading them into wisps of the past.
meanings.sent5: The enzymes autolyzed the protein, transforming it into a new form.

meanings.sent1: The scientist autolyzed the cells to study their structure.
meanings.sent2: They autolyzed the meat to extract the flavorful broth.
meanings.sent3: The chef autolyzed the ingredients, creating a unique dish.
meanings.sent4: The process autolyzed the material, revealing its inner components.
meanings.sent5: Autolyzing the solution helped separate the different compounds.
